original_text: Joab returned from the pursuit of Abner. And when he had gathered all the people together, there were missing from David's servants nineteen men besides Asahel.
korean_text: 요압이 아브넬 쫓기를 그치고 돌아와 무리를 다 모으니 다윗의 신복 중에 열아홉 명과 아사헬이 없어졌으나

sentences.original_text: Joab returned from the pursuit of Abner.
And when he had gathered all the people together,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 모든 백성을 모았을 때,

sentences.original_text: there were missing from David's servants nineteen men besides Asahel.
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 신하 중에서 아사엘을 제외하고 열아홉 명이 없어졌습니다.
